forecast.name: Today

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 36. Southeast wind around 3 mph.

weather_report:
In Boston this morning, a gentle veil of clouds blankets the city, rendering the day with a muted luminosity that nudges the sunplay into a soft, diffused glow. As the hours unfurl, the high will flirt with the coolness that lingers in the air, hovering near fifty-two degrees. The northeast wind whispers at a leisurely pace, embracing light layers rather than heavy attire, perfect for those who might seek solace in a stroll along the charmed, cobblestone streets or perhaps a quiet escape into one of the local cafés. 

Tonight, as darkness takes its turn, the clouds will deepen, casting a shawl of gray over the evening, with temperatures retreating to a cool thirty-six degrees. The atmosphere is one for cozy pursuits; imagine curling up with a good book or indulging in a leisurely dinner with friends. There’s an inviting stillness in the air, a gentle prompt to savor the simple pleasures of life. Embrace this transient weather, as the promise of spring hovers just beyond the horizon.
